query:
SELECT
            c."id" as "chat_id",
            m.id as "message_id",
            c."userId" as "user_id",
            c."createdAt" as "created_at",
            c."updatedAt" as "updated_at"
        FROM
            "ChatMessage" m
        JOIN
            "Chat" c on c."id" = m."chatId"
        WHERE
            c."userId" = ANY($1) AND c."deletedAt" IS NULL
        ORDER BY
            m."createdAt" DESC
        LIMIT $2
        OFFSET $3
